title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IX, pt. 2390 - Powers Of Attorney
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IX, pt. 2390 - Powers Of Attorney

State Regulations
§ 2390.1 - Requirement of power of attorney
§ 2390.2 to 2390.7 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IX, pt. 2390

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §171

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
